name: WeReno
headline: Owner's Rep as a Service for Construction
description:
WeReno is transforming construction with its Owner’s Rep platform, streamlining project oversight, coordination, and communication. With features such as AI assistance, the platform ensures efficient management and protects clients' interests.

Within 8 months of launching, we’ve partnered with the owners of Hilton, Holiday Inn, and over a dozen other hotels, along with Fortune 500 brands like Starbucks, Staples, CVS, and TJ Maxx. We manage $500M in property value, overseeing everything from maintenance to new builds, renovations, and property improvement plans.

Our platform guarantees seamless project execution, handling every aspect from start to finish with precision and care.

founders.name: Harry Grewal, Founder
founders.description: I am a serial entrepreneur with over a decade of experience in the home improvement industry. I previously founded a security company (DefenseTek.com) where I worked with over 800 homeowners as well as several Fortune 500 companies including Staples, TJ Maxx and CVS.

founders.name: Amrit Randhawa, Founder
founders.description: I am a CPA who previously worked in residential real estate asset management and have diverse experience in the home improvement industry, with a strong focus on finance + operations.

#  We make Project Management  simple.
Our Owner’s Rep as a Service Platform manages all construction details so you can focus on what you do best. We ensure a smooth, stress-free experience for your business or home.

##### About WeReno
## We believe in crafting seamless construction journeys that leave a lasting impact on your business or home.
##### Click play ▶ to watch a showcase video of our Banquet Hall renovation project!
[ View Case Study ](https://wereno.com/</case-studies/embassy-grand>)
WeReno began with a mission to transform construction management. From our early days, we’ve become a trusted ally, known for making construction effortless and stress-free for both homes and businesses. At WeReno, we’re not just managing projects; we’re shaping experiences that redefine the future of construction.
Our commitment is to deliver excellence with every project, ensuring a seamless experience from start to finish.
250 
Project value 
100 
Satisfied clients 
##### What We Do
## Owner's Rep as a Service Platform
We specialize in reducing risks and fostering collaboration while enhancing operational efficiency across all phases of your project.
###  Discovery Phase 
We guide early project decisions, focusing on risk reduction and improved collaboration.
[ Learn More ](https://wereno.com/</services>)
###  Development Planning 
We craft and implement a Project Management Plan to ensure project goals are achieved.
[ Learn More ](https://wereno.com/</services>)
###  Financial Structuring 
We secure private funding and create cost-effective financial solutions for your project.
[ Learn More ](https://wereno.com/</services>)
###  Project Execution 
We choose the best delivery method to complete your project on time and within budget.
[ Learn More ](https://wereno.com/</services>)
###  Seamless Integration 
We incorporate facilities management needs from the start for a smooth and efficient handover.
[ Learn More ](https://wereno.com/</services>)

##### Technology
## Revolutionizing Owner's Rep with Advanced Technology
Our platform upgrades traditional owner’s representation with AI-driven tools, real-time dashboards, automated compliance, and predictive analytics, ensuring efficient and transparent project management.
[ Learn More ](https://wereno.com/</services>)
#####  Dashboard 
![](https://wereno.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/dashboard-img.png)
![AI-Driven Copilot](https://wereno.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Marketing-Agency-Process-Icon-1.webp)
####  AI-Driven Copilot 
The AI copilot monitors project progress, identifies risks, and provides real-time solutions to keep everything on track and within budget.
![Dynamic and Interactive Dashboard](https://wereno.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Marketing-Agency-Process-Icon-2.webp)
####  Dynamic and Interactive Dashboard 
The dashboard delivers real-time updates on all project aspects, enabling easy access to data and enhancing transparency and collaboration.
![Automated Compliance and QA](https://wereno.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Marketing-Agency-Process-Icon-3.webp)
####  Automated Compliance and QA 
The platform automates compliance checks and quality assurance, ensuring that all project phases meet industry standards with minimal human error.
![Predictive Analytics](https://wereno.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Marketing-Agency-Process-Icon-4.webp)
####  Predictive Analytics 
Predictive analytics help forecast potential budget and scheduling issues, allowing for dynamic adjustments and proactive decision-making.
##### Our Plans

Select from our carefully crafted plans to match your needs—whether you require essential oversight or full-spectrum support, ensuring top-notch value and effectiveness.

generated_description:
WeReno is shaking up the construction landscape with its innovative take on project management through its Owner’s Representative as a Service platform. Founded in 2022 and a participant in the Y Combinator Batch W22, this Toronto-based startup has quickly made a name for itself, partnering with major brands like Hilton and Starbucks, to manage upwards of $500 million in property value. 

So, what exactly does WeReno do? They streamline project oversight and enhance communication, allowing owners to focus on what really matters—while the nuts and bolts of construction are expertly handled by their team. Their use of AI helps to keep everything on track, ensuring that client interests are not just met, but prioritized.

They've accomplished a lot in a short span, successfully overseeing a diverse range of projects that include new builds, renovations, and property improvement plans for notable clients such as CVS and TJ Maxx. Their platform covers every aspect of project execution, from initial consultation and development planning to execution and seamless handover. Essentially, they set the stage for a worry-free construction experience.

Their tech-savvy approach employs advanced tools like real-time dashboards and predictive analytics, which not only aid transparency but also predict potential issues before they escalate—saving both time and money. WeReno is clearly not just about getting the job done; they’re about revolutionizing how construction is done.

With a lean team of 10, WeReno demonstrates the power of agility in the tech-driven real estate and construction sectors. Their mission? To craft seamless construction journeys that leave a lasting impact on businesses and homes alike. 

If you’re looking for expertise that simplifies the complexity of construction projects, WeReno might just be your go-to partner. Explore more about what they can do for you at [WeReno's website](https://wereno.com).
